instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.U8900: What is U8900? This chip creates the GPU power rails on the 820-3332 board to the 2012 and early 2013 15‚Äù Retina Macbook Pros. It becomes desoldered and is the cause of no video and kernel panics/crashes in that model most of the time..

threads.title: garbled image on 3332 board after <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> fix
threads.message:
This board came in for the all-too-common <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> issue: upon arrival the machine worked fine, but would crash once the board switched from Integrated to Dedicated GPU (the typical MUX issue).
I have redone the solder on <CHIP>U8900</CHIP>, but after reassembly, the screen is showing distorted/garbled image. I have tested with another compatible screen, but the issue is the same there.
See my attached image for what i mean by distorted/garbled image.
Any ideas what may cause this issue? I have triple-checked the soldering on <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> and its surrounding components: all looks flawless.
Any ideas where to start chasin this issue?

threads.title: garbled image on 3332 board after <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> fix
threads.message:
i should also mention that i have swapped <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> for another chip from a donor; but unfortunately, the issue remains the same.
I have inspected the board for any knocked off components but no dice..

threads.title: garbled image on 3332 board after <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> fix
threads.message:
Image problem may be caused by GPU, or VRAM.
Maybe a BGA chip from graphics area reacted to hot air.

threads.title: garbled image on 3332 board after <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> fix
threads.message: Yes, you were right.. disabled the GPU with my Medusa, and the issue is gone.. Dammit, this is a no-fix then.

threads.title: garbled image on 3332 board after <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> fix
threads.message:
Is an old laptop.
The client should understand that using only iGPU is good enough.
